#!/usr/bin/env perl
use utf8;
use strict;
use warnings;
use Data::Printer {deparse => 1, caller_info => 1};

use Date::Japanese::Era;

{
 my $era = Date::Japanese::Era->new(2019, 5, 1);
 p $era->name;
 p $era->year;
}
{
 my $era = Date::Japanese::Era->new(2019, 4, 30);
 p $era->name;
 p $era->year;
}

{
 my $era = Date::Japanese::Era->new("ä»¤å’Œ", 1);
 p $era->gregorian_year;
}

#!/usr/bin/perl
use strict;
use warnings;
use POSIX;
my @vars = (1, 0.999, 0.9, 0.1, -0.1, -0.9, -0.999, -1);
foreach my $var (@vars) {
print "Target is $var\n";
print "ceil : ", ceil($var), "\n";
print "floor : ", floor($var), "\n";
print "int : ", int $var, "\n";
}
